tool_description: Discover Instagram & YouTube Influencers using various filters such as Follower Count, Category, Engagement Rate, Post Count, Social Platform, City & Country, Keywords in Bio and influencer handle. Choose from a list of our 24 curated categories, all of which are listed in the Tutorials tab.
title: Ylytic Influencers API

api_list.name: Search Instagram and YouTube Influencer
api_list.description: Search Instagram & YouTube Influencers using various filters such as Follower Count, Category, Engagement Rate, Post Count, Social Platform, City & Country, Keywords in Bio and influencer handle.

required_parameters.name: current_page
required_parameters.description: navigate through different pages of the desired query data

optional_parameters.name: posts_minimum
optional_parameters.description: search creator basis minimum posts they have shared

optional_parameters.name: bio_contains
optional_parameters.description: search creator basis keywords mentioned in their IG bio or YT description

optional_parameters.name: posts_maximum
optional_parameters.description: search creator basis maximum posts they have shared

optional_parameters.name: connector
optional_parameters.description: search creator either from Instagram or YouTube

optional_parameters.name: engagement_rate_minumum
optional_parameters.description: search creator basis their minimum engagement rate

optional_parameters.name: followers_maximum
optional_parameters.description: filter creators basis maximum follower/subscriber count

optional_parameters.name: engagement_rate_maximum
optional_parameters.description: search creator basis their maximum engagement rate

optional_parameters.name: followers_minimum
optional_parameters.description: filter creators basis minimum follower/subscriber count

optional_parameters.name: handle_contains
optional_parameters.description: filter creators basis specific text in their handle

creators.bio: Terrace Gardening Store near Me, All Types Of Organic Bio Fertilizers and Pots And Home Need Books And Stationers Vlogs

I am taking Gardening from just pretty flowers and for show, to functionality and sustainability. By giving you easy ways to propagate your plants; as well as, what to do with your harvest, you can expand your garden to its utmost potential. With using Organic Gardening and Permaculture you will be able to have just as beautiful and healthy of a garden as someone that uses Traditional Gardening techniques. Apart from plants, I will show you that you don't need lots of money to achieve beautiful gardens and what kind of resources are out there for anyone; garden or not, to use. Happy Gardening!

January 14th, 2009 I had MGB surgery with Dr. Rutledge.
Highest weight: 302
Day of surgery(Jan 14/09): 292 (-10) (-10)
January 13/10: 132 (0) (-170)
Many complications after that, lowest weight was 125. Had a revision from MGB to RNY March 27th, 2012 with Dr. Hagen in Toronto. Feeling much better now, weight is usually around 140.

NEW for 2017!!! Around a year after my revision, I started experiencing bariatric regain, and ended up regaining back up to a high of 253 pounds, over the past couple of years I have been working on getting it off, and am currently at goal again with a weight of 138 pounds.
